rancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0x11a5a79827df29e915a12740caf62fe21ebe27c08c9ae3e09abe9ee3ba3866d3","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://3cf0c69ab827e3251db9ee6a50647d62c90ba580a4d7bbff21f2bea39e7b2f4a","dweb:/ipfs/QmZiKwtKU1SBX4RGfQtY7PZfiapbbu6SZ9vizGQD9UHjRA"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8891738ffe910f0cf2da09566928589bf5d63f4524dd734fd9cedbac3274dd5c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://971f954442df5c2ef5b5ebf1eb245d7105d9fbacc7386ee5c796df1d45b21617","dweb:/ipfs/QmadRjHbkicwqwwh61raUEapaVEtaLMcYbQZWs9gUkgj3u"]},"src/GoldPriceOracle.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc561872e7331bd6d0a35bf6274220d97b7bdaddec60d25c9d8e910f145be332a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://08d3e57804d38dc4a42800e14c6af235fb3309877dcbd48c378d0a3d51e87d2a","dweb:/ipfs/QmcXtWzXkrNUQPk7KQyNnwSzCyuHzroepMSkASEKasXRdN"]},"src/POIPOI.sol":{"keccak256":"0x235344a46140e1d80ff0ea2d7053bfb7b6aa579c8211c6f18841994aca63d5e7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://e8f01fb22f79620bba694405b3cccd953204b20a3a0777a6b55462b14017124e","dweb:/ipfs/QmcoW9WZcxqFiiKjyWavGpZjAcRNmAmj6ZdL5g5Y69Cre5"]},"src/POIPOIManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3b60ef684b1aed5bc0b5b670457f5e5f24e91bf73fb56c9b1cdbdb6d156ba591","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://e4e36a6021edb02dd1be8815a164a2c443610318d0d9528e4c731be77063ad3a","dweb:/ipfs/QmVXrHbnSNvmccGPGUBNqtGDjUEZLGLMerWjmPUxWSGpCg"]}},"version":1}

calculateCollateralAmount(uint256).details: Calculate collateral amount for given POI amount

returns.collateralAmount: Amount of collateral tokens that would be returned

calculatePoiAmount(uint256).details: Calculate POI amount for given collateral amount

returns.poiAmount: Amount of POI tokens that would be minted

constructor.details: Constructor initializes the manager with required contracts

params._goldOracle: Address of gold price oracle contract

returns._0: balance Current collateral token balance in this contract

getCurrentGoldPrice().details: Get current gold price from oracle

returns._0: price Current gold price per gram
supply Current POI token total supply
isStale True if oracle price is stale

mintPoi(uint256).details: Mint POI tokens by depositing collateral

params.collateralAmount: Amount of collateral tokens to deposit (18 decimals)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.poiAmount: Amount of POI tokens to redeem (18 decimals)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.stopped: True to stop, false to resume

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
